ceplFeatures.title: Our Combat Arms Ear Plugs Lawsuit specialists in hurt by defective Medical Device.
ceplFeatures.paragraph: We will give you comprehensive advice our rights, entitlements, Obligations, and the most effective option to settle your dispute.

WidgetOne.title: 3M-Defective-Earplug-Lawsuit
WidgetOne.description: Defective earplugs caused veterans' hearing problems. Were you issued 3M earplugs during service? Find out if you have a claim at no cost.

blockOne.title: This Alert Effects
blockOne.description: Defective earplugs caused veterans' hearing problems. Were you issued 3M earplugs during service? Find out if you have a claim at no cost.

blockTwo.title: What's Going On?
blockTwo.description: Defense contractor 3M Company settled a False Claims Act lawsuit in July that alleged the dual-ended Combat Arms Earplugs it supplied to the military between 2003 and 2015 were defective and caused many service members to suffer hearing loss.

blockThree.title: How Can a Lawsuit Help?
blockThree.description: A lawsuit could award money to affected individuals for medical bills. pain and suffering, and other damages they've suffered from using the allegedly defective earplugs.

blockFour.title: What Can I Do?
blockFour.description: Fill out the form on this page and tell us what happened. One of the attorneys we work with may contact you directly and can help explain your rights.

blockFive.title: Is this a Class Action?
blockFive.description: No. You will need to speak to an attorney to file your own lawsuit specific to your experience and injuries. You can find out more about the process by contacting us through the form on this page.
